마법 아이템 II (갑옷 & 무기)

MAGIC ITEMS II (ARMOR & WEAPONS)

갑옷

ARMOR

In general, magic 갑옷 protects the wearer to a 상급 extent than nonmagical 갑옷. Magic 갑옷 bonuses are enhancement bonuses, never rise above +5, and stack with regular 갑옷 bonuses (and with 방패 and magic 방패 enhancement bonuses). All magic 갑옷 is also 명품 갑옷, reducing 갑옷 check penalties by 1.

In addition to an enhancement bonus, 갑옷 may have 특수 능력. 특수 능력 usually count as additional bonuses for determining the market value of an item, but do not improve AC. A suit of 갑옷 cannot have an effective bonus (enhancement plus special ability bonus equivalents) higher than +10. A suit of 갑옷 with a special ability must have at least a +1 enhancement bonus.

A suit of 갑옷 or a 방패 may be made of an unusual material. Roll d%: 01–95 indicates that the item is of a standard sort, and 96–100 indicates that it is made of a special material.

갑옷 is always created so that even if the type of 갑옷 comes with boots or gauntlets, these pieces can be switched for other magic boots or gauntlets.

All magic 방패 are masterwork 방패 (with an 갑옷 check penalty 1 less than normal).

시전자 레벨 for 갑옷 및 방패: The 시전자 레벨 of a magic 방패 or magic 갑옷 with a special ability is given in the item 묘사. For an item with only an enhancement bonus, the 시전자 레벨 is three times the enhancement bonus. If an item has both an enhancement bonus and a special ability, the higher of the two 시전자 레벨 필요조건 must be met.

방패: 방패 enhancement bonuses stack with 갑옷 enhancement bonuses. 방패 enhancement bonuses do not act as 공격 or 피해 bonuses when the 방패 is used in a bash. The bashing special ability, however, does grant a +1 bonus on 공격 and 피해 rolls (see the special ability 묘사).

A 방패 could be built that also acted as a 마법 무기, but the cost of the enhancement bonus on 명중 굴림 would need to be added into the cost of the 방패 and its enhancement bonus to AC.

As with 갑옷, 특수 능력 built into the 방패 add to the market value in the form of additions to the bonus of the 방패, although they do not improve AC. A 방패 cannot have an effective bonus (enhancement plus special ability bonus equivalents) higher than +10. A 방패 with a special ability must have at least a +1 enhancement bonus.

방패 Hardness and 히트 포인트: Each +1 of enhancement bonus adds 2 to a 방패’s hardness and +10 to its 히트 포인트.

Activation: Usually a character benefits from magic 갑옷 및 방패 in exactly the way a character benefits from nonmagical 갑옷 및 방패—by wearing them. If 갑옷 or a 방패 has a special ability that the user needs to activate then the user usually needs to utter the 명령 word (a standard action).

비표준 규격 갑옷: The cost of 갑옷 for nonhumanoid creatures, as well as for creatures who are neither Small nor Medium, varies. The cost of the masterwork quality and any magical enhancement remains the same.

Arrow Catching: A 방패 with this ability attracts ranged 무기 to it. It has a deflection bonus of +1 against ranged 무기 because projectiles and thrown 무기 veer toward it. Additionally, any projectile or thrown weapon aimed at a target within 5 feet of the 방패’s wearer diverts from its original target and targets the 방패’s bearer instead. (If the wielder has total 엄폐 relative to the attacker, the projectile or thrown weapon is not diverted.) Additionally, those attacking the wearer with ranged 무기 ignore any miss chances that would normally apply. Projectiles and thrown 무기 that have an enhancement bonus higher than the 방패’s base AC bonus are not diverted to the wearer (but the 방패’s increased AC bonus still applies against these 무기). The wielder can activate or deactivate this ability with a 명령 word.

Moderate 회피술; CL 8th; 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작, 혼돈의 방패; Price +1 bonus.

Arrow Deflection: This 방패 protects the wielder as if he had the 화살 쳐내기 feat. Once per round when he would normally be struck by a ranged weapon, he can make a DC 20 Reflex save. If the ranged weapon has an enhancement bonus, the DC increases by that amount. If he succeeds, the 방패 deflects the weapon. He must be aware of the 공격 and not flat-footed. Attempting to deflect a ranged weapon doesn’t count as an action. Exceptional ranged 무기, such as boulders hurled by 거인 or 산성 화살, can’t be deflected.

Faint 회피술; CL 5th; 마법 무기 및 갑옷 제작, 방패; Price +2 bonus.

마법 무기 have enhancement bonuses ranging from +1 to +5. They apply these bonuses to both 공격 and 피해 rolls when used in 전투. All 마법 무기 are also 명품 무기, but their masterwork bonus on 명중 굴림 does not stack with their enhancement bonus on 명중 굴림.

무기 come in two basic categories: melee and ranged. Some of the 무기 listed as melee 무기 can also be used as ranged 무기. In this case, their enhancement bonus applies to either type of 공격.

In addition to an enhancement bonus, 무기 may have 특수 능력. 특수 능력 count as additional bonuses for determining the market value of the item, but do not modify 공격 or 피해 bonuses (except where specifically noted). A single weapon cannot have a modified bonus (enhancement bonus plus special ability bonus equivalents) higher than +10. A weapon with a special ability must have at least a +1 enhancement bonus.

A weapon or a kind of ammunition may be made of an unusual material. Roll d%: 01–95 indicates that the item is of a standard sort, and 96–100 indicates that it is made of a special material.

시전자 레벨 for 무기: The 시전자 레벨 of a weapon with a special ability is given in the item 묘사. For an item with only an enhancement bonus and no other 능력, the 시전자 레벨 is three times the enhancement bonus. If an item has both an enhancement bonus and a special ability, the higher of the two 시전자 레벨 필요조건 must be met.

Additional 피해 주사위: Some 마법 무기 deal additional 주사위 of 피해. Unlike other modifiers to 피해, additional 주사위 of 피해 are not multiplied when the attacker scores a critical hit.

Ranged 무기 and Ammunition: The enhancement bonus from a ranged weapon does not stack with the enhancement bonus from ammunition. Only the higher of the two enhancement bonuses applies.

Ammunition fired from a projectile weapon with an enhancement bonus of +1 or higher is treated as a 마법 무기 for the 목적 of overcoming 피해 축소. Similarly, ammunition fired from a projectile weapon with an 성향 gains the 성향 of that projectile weapon (in addition to any 성향 it may already have).
